issue.title: [C++] Move over compression library toolchain from parquet-cpp
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1142](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1142). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This way we can use compression in other contexts, and parquet-cpp can get these libraries from the Arrow libraries

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1142?focusedCommentId=16062036) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
